refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Known Implementations
refsect1.para: GtkCellLayout is implemented by GtkEntryCompletion, GtkTreeViewColumn, GtkComboBox and GtkComboBoxEntry.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GtkCellLayout is an interface to be implemented by all objects which want to provide a GtkTreeViewColumn-like API for packing cells, setting attributes and data funcs.

refsect2.title: struct GtkCellLayoutIface
GtkCellLayoutDataFunc ()
refsect2.programlisting: void (*GtkCellLayoutDataFunc) (GtkCellLayout *cell_layout, GtkCellRenderer *cell, GtkTreeModel *tree_model, GtkTreeIter *iter, gpointer data);
refsect2.para: A function which should set the value of cell_layout's cell renderer(s) as appropriate.

listitem.simpara: the cell renderer whose value is to be set
a GtkTreeIter indicating the row to set the value for

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_pack_start ()
refsect2.para: Packs the cell into the beginning of cell_layout. If expand is FALSE, then the cell is allocated no more space than it needs. Any unused space is divided evenly between cells for which expand is TRUE.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if cell is to be given extra space allocated to cell_layout.

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_pack_end ()
refsect2.para: Adds the cell to the end of cell_layout. If expand is FALSE, then the cell is allocated no more space than it needs. Any unused space is divided evenly between cells for which expand is TRUE.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if cell is to be given extra space allocated to cell_layout.

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_reorder ()
refsect2.para: Re-inserts cell at position. Note that cell has already to be packed into cell_layout for this to function properly.

listitem.simpara: New position to insert cell at.

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_clear ()
refsect2.para: Unsets all the mappings on all renderers on cell_layout.

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes ()
refsect2.para: Sets the attributes in list as the attributes of cell_layout. The attributes should be in attribute/column order, as in gtk_cell_layout_add_attribute(). All existing attributes are removed, and replaced with the new attributes.

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_add_attribute ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_cell_layout_add_attribute (GtkCellLayout *cell_layout, GtkCellRenderer *cell, const gchar *attribute, gint column);
refsect2.para: Adds an attribute mapping to the list in cell_layout. The column is the column of the model to get a value from, and the attribute is the parameter on cell to be set from the value. So for example if column 2 of the model contains strings, you could have the "text" attribute of a GtkCellRendererText get its values from column 2.

listitem.simpara: The column position on the model to get the attribute from.

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_set_cell_data_func ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_cell_layout_set_cell_data_func (GtkCellLayout *cell_layout, GtkCellRenderer *cell, GtkCellLayoutDataFunc func, gpointer func_data, GDestroyNotify destroy);
refsect2.para: Sets the GtkCellLayoutDataFunc to use for cell_layout. This function is used instead of the standard attributes mapping for setting the column value, and should set the value of cell_layout's cell renderer(s) as appropriate. func may be NULL to remove and older one.

refsect2.title: gtk_cell_layout_clear_attributes ()
refsect2.para: Clears all existing attributes previously set with gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes().

listitem.simpara: A GtkCellRenderer to clear the attribute mapping on.
